extendedInfo.description: The premier educational pocket reference for the most accurate Cannabis MMJ info.  CPR LITE EDITION!Strains (DNA) -   Marijuana Strain Database  Heritage, description  Growing notes  Zoomable photo  Sort by name or flowering time  225+ types w/ more on the wayLegal status maps -     Worldwide, Europe, and USA RSS News Updates From HempgateHistory Timeline with photosThe Full Version adds our outstanding Grow and Alchemy Guides.Visually Rich and InformativeCompletely Ad FreeMore info + screen shots: http://bit.ly/cpr23With our dank weed app it'll be 420 in your pocket!
